snippet: Grant Holman hit a three-run homer in the top of the ninth and Chula Vista, Calif., rallied for a 6-3 victory over New England champion Westport, Conn.
abstract: Chula Vista, Calif, defeats Westport, Conn, 6-3, to earn berth in the United States championship game at the Little League World Series.
lead_paragraph: Grant Holman hit a three-run homer in the top of the ninth and Chula Vista, Calif., rallied for a 6-3 victory over New England champion Westport, Conn.

headline.main: California Team Gains U.S. Championship Final
